desc.f: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
desc.to: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

desc.f: GUID which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
desc.to: The ID of the target subscription.
The API version to use for this operation.

v.desc: Specifies the valid streaming units a streaming job can scale to.

items.desc: Specifies the number of streaming units that the streaming job can use.
